coreAttributes.name: winter pants
coreAttributes.description: A pair of comfortable waterproof warm winter pants that protect the wearer against cold weather.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the winter pants, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the winter pants, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the winter pants, before yanking them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc.her] winter pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] winter pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] winter pants, before yanking them off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc.her] winter pants back up to sit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc2.namePos] winter pants back up to sit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the top of [npc2.namePos] winter pants back up to sit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc.her] winter pants.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc2.namePos] winter pants.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the top of [npc2.namePos] winter pants.
